Scene:
The Bloodthirsty Sword
(Okuniwa jūningiri / 奥庭十人斬り)

Play: The Bloodshed at Ise (伊勢音頭恋寝刃)

Production: July 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
